main.missing-moduleconf: Missing moduleConfig-file. Automatically disabling all modules and overwriting modules.json later
main.login-error: Bot could not log in. Error: %e
main.login-error-token: Bot could not log in because the provided token is invalid. Please update your token.
main.login-error-intents: Bot could not log in because the intents were not enabled correctly. Please enable "PRESENCE INTENT", "SERVER MEMBERS INTENT" and "MESSAGE CONTENT INTENT" in your Discord-Developer-Dashboard: %url
main.not-invited: Please invite the bot to your Discord server before continuing: %inv
main.require-code-grant-active: You might be unable to invite your bot to your server as you have enabled the "Require public code grant" option in your Discord Developer Dashboard. Please disable this option: %d
main.interactions-endpoint-active: You bot will be unable to respond to interactions, because the field "Interactions Endpoint URL" has a value in your Discord Developer Dashboard. Please remove any content from this field and restart your bot: %d
main.logged-in: Bot logged in as %tag and is now online.
main.logchannel-wrong-type: There is no Log-Channel set or it has the wrong type (only text-channels are supported).
main.config-check-failed: Configuration-Check failed. You can find more information in your log. The bot exited.
main.bot-ready: The bot initiated successfully and is now listening to commands
main.no-command-permissions: Could not update server commands. Please give us permissions to performe this critical action: %inv
main.hidden-module: Module %m is hidden, meaning that it is not available. Skipping‚Ä¶
main.guild-command-no-sync-required: Server application commands are up to date - no syncing required
main.global-command-no-sync-required: Global application commands are up to date - no syncing required
main.channel-unlock-data-not-found: Unlocking channel with ID %c failed because it was never locked (which is weird to begin with).
main.migrate-start: Migration from %o to %m started... Please do not stop the bot

reload.reloaded-config:
Configuration reloaded successfully.
Out of %totalModules modules, %enabled were enabled, %configDisabled were disabled because their configuration was wrong.
reload.reload-failed: Configuration reloaded failed. Bot shutting down.
reload.reload-successful-syncing-commands: Configuration reloaded successfully, syncing commands, to make sure permissions are up-to-date‚Ä¶
reload.reload-failed-message:
**FAILED**
```%r```
**Please read your log to find more information**
The bot will kill itself now, bye :wave:

config.done-with-checking: Done with checking. Out of %totalModules modules, %enabled were enabled, %configDisabled were disabled because their configuration was wrong.
config.creating-file: Config %m/%f does not exist - I'm going to create it, please stand by...
config.checking-of-field-failed: An error occurred while checking the content of field "%fieldName" in %m/%f
config.moduleconf-regeneration: Regenerating module configuration, no settings will be overwritten, don't worry.

command.startup: The bot is currently starting up. Please try again in a few minutes.
command.wrong-guild: This command is only available on the server **%g**.
command.autcomplete-execution-failed: Execution of auto-complete on command /%c %g %s with option %f failed: %e
command.execution-failed-message:
## 🔴 Command execution failed 🔴
This usually happens either due to misconfiguration or due to an error on our site. Please send a screenshot of this message in #support on the [ScootKit Discord](https://scootk.it/dc-en), to resolve this.

### Internal Tracing ID
`%t`
### Debugging-Information
```%e```
command.error-giving-role: An error occurred when trying to giving to give you your roles ):
command.description-too-long: The following command description of %c was too long to sync: %s
command.module-disabled: This command is part of the "%m" which is disabled. This can either be intended by the server-admins (and slash-commands haven't synced yet) or this could be caused by a configuration error. Please check (or ask the admins) to check the bot's configuration and logs for details.

help.bot-info-description: This bot is part of [SCNX](https://scnx.xyz/de?ref=custombot_help_embed), a plattform from [ScootKit](https://scootkit.net) allowing the creation of fully customizable for Discord communities, and is being hosted for "%g".
help.stats-content:
Active modules: %am
Registered commands: %rc
Bot-Version: %v
Running on server %si
[Server-Plan](https://scnx.xyz/plan): %pl
Last restart: %lr
Last reload: %lR

bot-feedback.command-description: Send feedback about the bot to the bot developer
bot-feedback.submitted-successfully:
Thanks so much for your feedback! It has been carefully recorded and our team will review it soon. If we have any questions, we may contact you via DM (or if you are on our [Support Server](<https://scootk.it/dc>) we'll open a ticket). Thank you for making [CustomBots](<https://scnx.xyz/bot>) better for everyone <3

Your feedback is subject to our [Terms of service](<https://scootk.it/scnx-tos>) and [Privacy Policy](<https://https://scootk.it/scnx-privacy>).
bot-feedback.failed-to-submit: Sorry, but I couldn't send your feedback to our staff. This could be, because you got blocked or because of some server issue we are having. You can always report bugs and submit feedback in our [Feature-Board](https://features.sc-network.net). Thank you.
bot-feedback.feedback-description: Your feedback. Make sure it's neutral, constructive and helpful

admin-tools.duration-wrong: The value of the duration argument is wrong. Learn more [in our docs](<https://scootk.it/scnx-duration>)

admin-tools.users-trying-to-manage-higher-role: Your highest role, %t, is not below %e. To manage a user's role, you the role you are managing needs to be below your highest role.

welcomer.welcome-yourself-error: Welcome, nice to meet you! This button is reversed for a special member of this server who want's to say "Hi" to you ^^

birthdays.sync-error: [birthdays] %u's state was set to "sync", but there was no syncing candidate, so I disabled the synchronization
birthdays.no-birthday-set: You don't currently have a registered birthday on this server. Set a birthday with `/birthday set`.
birthdays.birthday-status: Your birthday is currently set to **%dd.%mm%yyyy**%age.
birthdays.your-age: which means that you are **%age** years old
birthdays.sync-on: Your birthday is being synced via your [SC Network Account](https://sc-network.net/dashboard).
birthdays.sync-off: Your birthday is set locally on this server and will not be synchronized
birthdays.no-sync-account: It seems like you either don't have an [SC Network Account](<https://sc-network.net/dashboard>) or you haven't entered any information about your birthday in it yet.
birthdays.auto-sync-on:
It seems that you have autoSync in your [SC Network Account](<https://sc-network.net/dashboard>) enabled. This means that your birthday will be synchronized all the time on every server. [Learn more](<https://docs.sc-network.net/de/dashboard/birthday-sync-faq#ich-kann-meinen-geburtstag-nicht-mehr-manuell-auf-einem-server-setzen>).
Your birthday isn't showing up? It can take up to 24 hours (usually it's less than two hours) for it to be synced, so stay calm and wait just a bit longer.
birthdays.enabled-sync: Successfully set. The synchronization is now enabled :+1:
birthdays.disabled-sync: Successfully set. The synchronization is disabled, you can now change or remove your birthday from this server.
birthdays.delete-but-sync-is-on: You currently have sync enabled. Please disable sync to delete your birthday.
birthdays.only-sync-allowed: This server only allows synchronization of your birthday with a [SC Network Account](<https://sc-network.net/dashboard>)
birthdays.against-tos: You have to be at least 13 years old to use Discord. Please read Discord's [Terms of Service](<https://discord.com/tos>) and if you are under the age of 13 please [delete your account](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/212500837-How-do-I-permanently-delete-my-account->) to comply with Discord's [Terms of Service](<https://discord.com/tos>) and wait %waitTime (or for the age for your country, listed [here](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040724612-Why-is-Discord-asking-for-my-birthday->)) years before creating a new account.
birthdays.too-old: It seems like you are too old to be alive
birthdays.command-description: View, edit and delete your birthday
birthdays.status-command-description: Shows the current status of your birthday
birthdays.sync-command-description: Manage the synchronization on this server
birthdays.sync-command-action-description: Action which should be performed on your synchronization
birthdays.delete-command-description: Deletes your birthday from this server
birthdays.migration-happening: Database-Schema not up-to-date. Migration database... This could take a while. Do not restart your bot to avoid data loss.
birthdays.migration-done: Successfully migrated database to newest version.

levels.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-user-xp: Okay, do you really want to screw with %u? If you hate them so much, feel free to run `/manage-levels reset-xp confirm:True user:%ut` to run this irreversible action.
levels.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-server-x: Do you really want to delete all XP and Levels from this server? This action is irreversible and everyone on this server will hate you. Decided that it's worth it? Enter `/manage-levels reset-xp confirm:True`

levels.successfully-deleted-all-xp-of-users: Successfully deleted all the XP of all users
levels.cheat-no-profile: This user doesn't have a profile (yet), please force them to write a message before trying to betrayal your community by manipulating level scores.
levels.successfully-changed:
Successfully edited the XP of %u - they are now **level %l** with **%x XP**.
Remember, every change you make destroys the experience of other users on this server as the levelsystem isn't fair anymore.

moderation.unlocked-channel-successfully: Unlocked channel successfully. Permissions got restored to the permission-state before the lock occurred.
moderation.unlock-audit-log-reason: User %u unlocked this channel by running /moderate unlock
moderation.warning-not-found: I could not find this warning. Please make sure you are actually using a warning-id and not a userid.
moderation.actions-embed-description: You can find every action against %u here.
moderation.report-embed-description: A user reported another user. Please review the case and take actions if needed.
moderation.message-log-description: You can find an encrypted message-log [here](%u).
moderation.no-report-pings: No pings configured. Check your configuration to ping your staff.
moderation.not-allowed-to-see-own-notes: Sorry, but you are not allowed to see your own notes.
moderation.note-not-found-or-no-permissions: Note not found or no permissions to edit this note.
moderation.no-notes-found: No notes about this user. Create a new note with `/moderate notes create` and set the notes attribute.
moderation.more-notes: %x other moderator also added notes about this user. Notes are sorted in reverse chronology, so you will see the newest notes first.
moderation.user-not-on-server: I can't perform this action on this user, as they are not currently on your server.
moderation.captcha-verification-pending: Captcha-Verification is pending. You can either wait for the user to complete it or skip it manually.
moderation.verify-channel-set-but-not-found-or-wron: The configured verify-channel could not be found or it's type is not supported.
moderation.generating-message: We are preparing some stuff, this message should get edited shortly...
moderation.member-not-found: This user could not be found, maybe they already left?
moderation.already-verified: Seems like you are already verified... Why would you want to repeat this process?
moderation.restarted-verification: I have sent you another DM about your verification process. Please read it carefully and follow the actions described in it. Please not that this action did not re-trigger the manual-verification (if enabled), so spamming this button is useless.
moderation.dms-still-disabled: It seems like your DMs are still disabled. Please enable your DMs to start the verification. This is not optional, you need to do this in order to get access to %g.
moderation.dms-not-enabled-ping: %p, it seems like you have your DMs disabled. Please enable them and hit the button below this message to verify yourself. You have two minutes to complete this process.

counter.not-a-number: This is not a number. You can not chat here. Try creating a thread if your message is that important.
counter.restriction-audit-log: This user proceeded to abuse the counter channel after five warnings, so we locked them out.
counter.only-one-message-per-person: Users have to take turns counting: You can not count two times in a row.
counter.not-the-next-number: That's not the next number. The next number is **%n**, please make sure you are counting up one by one.
counter.channel-topic-change-reason: Someone counted, so we updated the description as required by the configuration

tickets.existing-ticket: You already have a ticket open: %c
tickets.ticket-created-audit-log: %u created a new ticket by clicking the button
tickets.ticket-created: Successfully created ticket and notified staff. Head over to it: %c
tickets.no-admin-pings: No pings configured. Check your configuration to ping your staff.
tickets.ticket-closed-successfully: Closed ticket successfully. This channel will be deleted in a few seconds, thanks for reaching out to our support.
tickets.ticket-log-value: Transcript with %n messages can be found [here](%u).

reminders.in-description: After what time should we remind you? (eg. "2h 30m")
reminders.what-description: What should we remind you about?
reminders.dm-description: Should we send you a DM instead of reminding your in this channel?
reminders.one-minute-in-future: Your reminder needs to be at least one minute in the future
reminders.reminder-set: Reminder set. We'll remind you at %d.

afk-system.command-description: Manage your AFK-Status on this server
afk-system.reason-option-description: Explain why you started this session
afk-system.autoend-option-description: If enabled, the bot will auto-end your AFK Session when your write a message (default: enabled)
afk-system.no-running-session: You don't have any session running.
afk-system.already-running-session: You already have an AFK-Session running, try ending it with `/afk-system end`.
afk-system.afk-nickname-change-audit-log: Updated user nickname because they started an AFK-Session

tic-tac-toe.command-description: Play tic-tac-toe against someone in the chat
tic-tac-toe.challenge-message: %t, %u challenged you to a game of tic-tac-toe! Hit the button below to join the battle! This invitation will expire in about 2 minutes, so don't hesitate to much.
tic-tac-toe.self-invite-not-possible: Are you really that lonely? Even Simon, a complete introvert with no friends and developer of this bot, can find another user to play tic-tac-toe with... You should be able to do that too, try inviting %r for example, maybe they want to play a round?
tic-tac-toe.invite-expired: Sorry, %u, %i didn't accept your request to play tic-tac-toe in time ):
tic-tac-toe.invite-denied: Sorry, %u, but %i denied your request to play a round of tic-tac-toe ):
tic-tac-toe.you-are-not-the-invited-one: Sorry, but this invite doesn't belong to you. You can start your own game with `/tic-tac-toe`.
tic-tac-toe.playing-header:
**TIC-TAC-TOE GAME IS RUNNING**

%u (üü¢) VS %i (üü°)
Currently on turn: %t

%t, click a button with a white circle below to place your marker
tic-tac-toe.win-header:
**TIC-TOE-GAME ENDED**

%u (üü¢) VS %i (üü°)

%w won the game - GG!

*You can start a new round by using `/tic-tac-toe`*
tic-tac-toe.draw-header:
**TIC-TOE-GAME ENDED**

%u (üü¢) VS %i (üü°)

Draw - no one won this game.
tic-tac-toe.not-your-turn: It's not your turn, take a coffee and return later

duel.command-description: Play duel against someone in the chat
duel.challenge-message: %t, %u challenged you to a game of duel! Hit the button below to join the battle! This invitation will expire in about 2 minutes, so don't hesitate to much.
duel.self-invite-not-possible: Are you really that lonely? Even Simon, a complete introvert with no friends and developer of this bot, can find another user to play duel with... You should be able to do that too, try inviting %r for example, maybe they want to play a round?
duel.invite-expired: Sorry, %u, %i didn't accept your request to play duel in time ):
duel.invite-denied: Sorry, %u, but %i denied your request to play a round of duel ):
duel.you-are-not-the-invited-one: Sorry, but this invite doesn't belong to you. You can start your own game with `/duel`.
duel.continues-info: The game continues once both parties have selected their next action.
duel.how-does-this-game-work: Wondering how this game works? Read our short explanation [here](<https://faq.scnx.app/duel-game/>).
duel.no-bullets: Sorry, but you haven't loaded any bullets yet, so you can't use your gun yet.
duel.bullets-full: Sorry, but your gun only has place for 5 bullets at a time.
duel.gun-gun: Both %g1 and %g1 draw their guns. They stare each other and their eyes and slowly lower their weapons. No, the duell won't be resolved if both die - there can only be one winner.
duel.guard-gun: %g1 draws their gun and shoot - %d1 dodged the bullet successfully.
duel.guard-guard: Both %d1 and %d2 wait for each other to fire the shot - but nothing happens.
duel.reload-gun: While %r1 starts reloading their gun, %g1 draws their weapon and shoots - it's a head-shot. %r1 drops to the ground. %g1 should celebrate because they won, but they are left feeling bad for murdering their old friend.
duel.guard-over-reload-gun: As this is %r1's fifth guard in a row, they are tired and are to slow - %g1 shoots them directly into their head and %r1 drops to the ground. It's a win for %g1 - but at what price?
duel.reload-reload: Both %r1 and %r2 stare each other in the eyes while taking a short break to load one bullet each in their chamber.
duel.reload-guard: %d1 prepares to doge a bullet - but %r1 uses the time to load their weapon - no shots get fired.
duel.ended-state: This game ended. You can start a new duel with `/duel`.
duel.not-your-game: You are not one of players - you can start a new game with `/duel`.

economy-system.crime-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by committing a crime
economy-system.message-drop-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by getting a message drop
economy-system.rob-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by robbing from %v
economy-system.weekly-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by cashing in their weekly reward
economy-system.daily-earned-money: The user %u gained %m %c by cashing in their daily reward
economy-system.admin-self-abuse: The admin %a wanted to abuse their permissions by giving them self even more money! This can't and should not be ignored!
economy-system.admin-self-abuse-answer: What a bad admin you are, %u.  I'm disappointed with you! I need to report this. If I wish I could ban you!
economy-system.added-money: %i %c has been added to the balance of %u
economy-system.removed-money: %i %c has been removed from the balance of %u
economy-system.set-money: The balance of %u has been set to %i.
economy-system.added-money-log: The user %u added %i %c to the balance of %v
economy-system.removed-money-log: The user %u removed %i %c from the balance of %v
economy-system.command-description-crime: Earn some cash by committing a crime
economy-system.command-description-rob: Rob some cash from another user
economy-system.crime-loose-money: The user %u lost %m %c by committing a crime
economy-system.command-description-balance: Show the balance of a user
economy-system.command-description-add: Add some cash to a user
economy-system.command-description-remove: Remove some cash from a user
economy-system.message-drop: Message-Drop: You earned %m %c simply by chatting!
economy-system.created-item: The user %u has created a new shop item: %i
economy-system.role-to-high: The specified role is higher than the highest role of the bot. Therefore the bot can't give the role to users. The item was **not** created.
economy-system.delete-item: The user %u has deleted the shop item %i
economy-system.user-purchase: The user %u has purchased the shop item %i for %p.
economy-system.shop-command-description-add: Create a new item in the shop (admins only)
economy-system.shop-option-description-role: Role to give to users who buy the item
economy-system.shop-command-description-list: List all items in the shop
economy-system.shop-command-description-delete: Remove an item from the shop
economy-system.channel-not-found: Can't find the leaderboard channel with the ID %c
economy-system.command-description-destroy: Destroy the whole economy (deletes all Database-Entries)
economy-system.option-description-confirm: Confirm, that you really want to destroy the whole economy
economy-system.destroy-cancel-reply: You're lucky. You stopped me in the last moment before I destroyed the economy
economy-system.destroy-reply: Ok... I'll destroy the whole economy
economy-system.nothing-selected: Select an item to buy it

status-role.not-fulfilled: Status-role condition is no longer fulfilled

color-me.create-log-reason: %user redeemed their boosting-rewards by requesting the creation of this role
color-me.delete-unboost-log-reason: %user stopped boosting, so their role got deleted
color-me.command-description: Request a Custom role as a reward for boosting. This has a cooldown of 24 hours
color-me.manage-subcommand-description: Create or edit your custom role
color-me.name-option-description: The name of your custom role
color-me.color-option-description: The color of your custom role
color-me.confirm-option-remove-description: Do you really want to delete your custom role? This will not reset any running cooldowns

uno.command-description: Play Uno against users in the chat
uno.challenge-message: %u invites to a round of Uno! Click the button below this message to join! The game starts %timestamp with %count players.
uno.not-enough-players: Not enough players joined for a round of Uno!
uno.use-drawn: Do you want to use the drawn card?
uno.win: %u won the game! %turns cards were played.
uno.missing-uno: ‚ö†Ô∏è You must use the Uno! button before you use your second last card!
uno.pending-draws: Use a Draw 2/4 card, otherwise you have to draw %count cards!
uno.auto-drawn-skip: Your turn was skipped because you would have had to draw the cards anyway.
uno.not-host: You're not the host of the game!
uno.used-card: You've already used the card %c! Use the Update button and play a valid card.
uno.invalid-card: You cannot play the card %c right now! Please select a valid card.
uno.inactive-warn: %u, it's your turn in the uno game!
uno.inactive-win: The uno game has ended. %u won as all others have been eliminated!

quiz.vote-this: Select this option if you think it's correct.
quiz.not-voted-yet: You have not selected an option yet, so I can't show you what you selected.
quiz.change-opinion: You can change your opinion at any time by selecting another option above the button you just clicked.
quiz.cannot-change-opinion: You cannot change your selection as the creator of this quiz disabled it.
quiz.cmd-create-normal-description: Create a quiz with up to 10 answers
quiz.cmd-create-bool-description: Create a quiz with true or false answers
quiz.cmd-leaderboard-description: Shows the quiz leaderboard of the server
quiz.cmd-create-channel-description: Channel in which the quiz should be created
quiz.cmd-create-endAt-description: How long the quiz will last
quiz.cmd-create-canchange-description: If the players can change their opinion after voting (default: no)
quiz.daily-quiz-limit: You've reached the limit of **%l** daily playable quizzes. You can play again %timestamp.
quiz.answer-correct: ‚úÖ Your answer was correct and you've received one point for the leaderboard!
quiz.leaderboard-channel-not-found: The leaderboard channel couldn't be found or it's type is invalid.
quiz.no-rank: You've never finished a quiz successfully!
quiz.no-quiz: No quizzes have been created for this server. Trusted admins can create them on https://scnx.app/glink?page=bot/configuration?query=quiz&file=quiz%7Cconfigs%2FquizList‚Ää.
quiz.no-permission: You don't have enough permissions to create quiz using the command.

starboard.star-limit:
You've reached the hourly starboard limit of %limitEmoji on the server which is why you cannot react on the message %msgUrl .
Try again %time!

nicknames.owner-cannot-be-renamed: The owner of the server (%u) cannot be renamed.
nicknames.nickname-error: An error occurred while trying to change the nickname of %u: %e

ping-protection.log-not-a-member: [Ping Protection] Punishment failed: The pinger is not a member.
ping-protection.log-punish-role-error: [Ping Protection] Punishment failed: I cannot punish %tag because their role is higher than or equal to my highest role.
ping-protection.log-mute-error: [Ping Protection] Punishment failed: I cannot mute %tag: %e
ping-protection.log-kick-error: [Ping Protection] Punishment failed: I cannot kick %tag: %e
ping-protection.log-data-deletion: [Ping Protection] All data for the user with ID %u has been deleted successfully.
ping-protection.log-automod-keyword-limit: [Ping Protection] Automod keywords exceed 1000 characters limit. Keywords were truncated.
ping-protection.punish-log-failed-desc: An error occured while trying to punish the user %m. Please check the bot's permissions and role hierarchy. See the message below for the error.
ping-protection.punish-role-error: I cannot punish %tag because their role is higher than or equal to my highest role.
ping-protection.reason-basic: User reached %c pings in the last %w weeks.
ping-protection.reason-advanced: User reached %c pings in the last %d days (Custom timeframe).
ping-protection.cmd-desc-group-user: Every command related to the users
ping-protection.cmd-desc-history: View the ping history of a user
ping-protection.cmd-desc-actions: View the moderation action history of a user
ping-protection.cmd-desc-panel: Admin: Open the user management panel
ping-protection.cmd-desc-list-protected: List of all the protected users and roles
ping-protection.cmd-desc-list-wl: List of all the whitelisted roles, channels and users
ping-protection.no-data-found: No logs found for this user.
ping-protection.actions-retention-note: Note: Moderation actions are retained for 1 - 12 months based on the configuration.
ping-protection.no-permission: You don't have sufficient permissions to use this command.
ping-protection.panel-description: Manage and view data for %u (%i). View a quick recap of their ping and moderation history, or delete all data stored for this user (Risky).
ping-protection.list-protected-desc: View all protected users and roles here. When someone pings one of these protected user(s)/role(s), a warning will be sent. Exceptions are when pinged by someone with a whitelisted role/as a whitelisted user or when it's sent in a whitelisted channel.
ping-protection.list-whitelist-desc: View all whitelisted roles, users and channels here. Whitelisted roles and users will not get a warning for pinging a protected entity, and pings from them or in whitelisted channels will be ignored.
ping-protection.modal-title: Confirm data deletion for this user
ping-protection.modal-label: Confirm data deletion by typing this phrase:
ping-protection.modal-phrase: I understand that all data of this user will be deleted and that this action cannot be undone.
ping-protection.modal-failed: The phrase you entered is incorrect. Data deletion cancelled.
ping-protection.modal-success-data-deletion: All data for the user <@%u> (%u) has been deleted successfully
ping-protection.field-quick-desc:
Pings history amount: %p
Moderation actions amount: %m
ping-protection.history-disabled:
History logging has been disabled by a bot-configurator.
Are you (one of) the bot-configurators? You can enable history logging in the "Data Storage" tab in the 'ping-protection' module ^^
ping-protection.leaver-warning-long: This user left the server at %d. These logs will stay until automatic deletion.
ping-protection.leaver-warning-short: This user left the server at %d.
ping-protection.meme-why: üòê [Why are you the way that you are?](<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NY9UZI1OUMI>) - You just pinged yourself..
ping-protection.meme-rick: üéµ [Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down...](<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ>) You just Rick Rolled yourself. Also congrats you unlocked the secret easter egg that only has a 1% chance of appearing!!1!1!!
ping-protection.meme-grind:
Why are you even pinging yourself 5 times in a row? Anyways continue some more to possibly get the secret meme
-# (good luck grinding, only a 1% chance of getting it and during testing I had it once after 83 pings)
ping-protection.no-message-link: This ping was blocked by AutoMod
